title: The Tale of Peter Rabbit
author: beatrix-potter
summary: The story of a mischievous rabbit who disobeys his mother and sneaks into Mr. McGregor's garden. One of the best-selling children's books of all time, it launched Beatrix Potter's career as an author-illustrator.

images.alt: The Tale of Peter Rabbit cover

attribution.note: Book data from Open Library (openlibrary.org), part of Internet Archive.

description: One of the best known and loved children's stories is the story of naughty Peter Rabbit and his misadventures as he is chased around a garden.
